results.description:
Mark a target, causing your initiative attacks to generate malice when they hit or critically hit your mark. Lose all malice when the mark ends or when this skill is recast on a new target.
Malice is only gained once per skill use.
name: Deadeye's Mark
Scharfschützenziel
Marque de Sniper
Marca de certero

traited_facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.
